combos.name: Snap to Go-Behind
combos.objective: Break posture, force hands post, circle behind.

combos.name: Snap to Front Headlock
combos.objective: Break posture, secure front headlock control.

combos.name: Collar Tie Duck Under
combos.objective: Opponent stiff-arms, duck under for back exposure.

combos.name: Collar Tie Shuck By
combos.objective: Opponent resists, shuck by for angle.

combos.name: Snap Feint to Shot
combos.objective: Fake snap, opponent posts, attack legs.

combos.name: Inside Tie Sweep Single
combos.objective: Control inside, level change, sweep single.

combos.name: Inside Tie High Crotch
combos.objective: Control inside, level change, high crotch finish.

combos.name: Sweep Single Whizzer to Go-Behind
combos.objective: Attack sweep, opponent whizzers, circle behind.

combos.name: Inside Tie Double Leg
combos.objective: Control inside, penetrate, double leg.

combos.name: Inside Tie Arm Drag
combos.objective: Control inside, drag arm for angle.

combos.name: Two-on-One Angle to Knee Tap
combos.objective: Control arm, create angle, knee tap finish.

combos.name: Two-on-One Square to Snap
combos.objective: Opponent squares up, snap down for control.

combos.name: Two-on-One Inside Step Shot
combos.objective: Control arm, level change, inside step shot.

combos.name: Two-on-One Arm Drag
combos.objective: Control arm, drag for back exposure.

combos.name: Underhook Whizzer to Knee Tap
combos.objective: Opponent whizzers, attack near knee.

combos.name: Underhook Circle to Throw By
combos.objective: Opponent circles, throw by for back.

combos.name: Underhook Body Lock
combos.objective: Secure underhook, lock body for throw.

combos.name: Underhook Snap
combos.objective: Control underhook, snap for front head.

combos.name: Whizzer Kickout to Go-Behind
combos.objective: Secure whizzer, kick out, circle behind.

combos.name: Whizzer Snap
combos.objective: Control whizzer, snap for front head.

combos.name: Whizzer Angle Step
combos.objective: Control whizzer, create angle for attack.

combos.name: Reach Bait to Snatch Single
combos.objective: Bait reach, snatch single on extension.

combos.name: Level Feint to Blast Double
combos.objective: Fake level, opponent reacts, blast double.

combos.name: Foot Feint to Shot
combos.objective: Fake step, opponent reaches, attack legs.

combos.name: Open Double Leg
combos.objective: Direct attack, penetrate, double leg.

combos.name: Open Snatch Single
combos.objective: Direct attack, snatch extended leg.

combos.name: Sprawl to Spin Behind
combos.objective: Defend shot, win head, spin behind.

combos.name: Sprawl to Front Headlock
combos.objective: Defend shot, secure front headlock.

combos.name: Down Block to Go-Behind
combos.objective: Block shot, circle behind.

combos.name: Sprawl to Reshot
combos.objective: Defend shot, immediately reattack.

combos.name: Wrist Control to Inside Tie
combos.objective: Control wrist, establish inside tie position.

combos.name: Fake Sweep to Arm Drag
combos.objective: Fake sweep single, opponent reacts, arm drag for angle.

combos.name: Fake High Crotch to Sweep Single
combos.objective: Fake high crotch, opponent reacts, sweep single.

combos.name: Fake Sweep to High Crotch
combos.objective: Fake sweep single, opponent reacts, high crotch.

combos.name: Underhook Angle to Knee Tap
combos.objective: Secure underhook, create angle, knee tap finish.

combos.name: Underhook Snap to Go-Behind
combos.objective: Underhook control, snap down, circle behind.

combos.name: Underhook Pummel to Body Lock
combos.objective: Fight for underhook, secure body lock.

combos.name: Underhook Throw By Chain
combos.objective: Opponent circles, throw by, continue attack.

combos.name: Whizzer Pressure Kickout
combos.objective: Apply whizzer pressure, kick out for separation.

combos.name: Whizzer Snap to Front Headlock
combos.objective: Control whizzer, snap for front headlock.

combos.name: Whizzer Angle to Attack
combos.objective: Control whizzer, create angle, attack opening.

combos.name: Whizzer Clear to Reset
combos.objective: Control whizzer, clear tie, reset position.

combos.name: Sweep Single → Run Pipe
combos.objective: Attack single leg, finish with run the pipe.

combos.name: Sweep Single to Dump
combos.objective: Attack single leg, finish with dump.

combos.name: Sweep Single to Trip
combos.objective: Attack single leg, finish with trip.

combos.name: High Crotch to Double
combos.objective: Attack high crotch, convert to double leg.

combos.name: High C Backstep
combos.objective: Attack high crotch, finish with backstep.

combos.name: High Crotch to Back
combos.objective: Attack high crotch, transition to back.

combos.name: High C Lift Dump
combos.objective: Attack high crotch, finish with lift and dump.

combos.name: Double → Angle Off
combos.objective: Attack double leg, finish with angle off.

combos.name: Double → Lift Dump
combos.objective: Attack double leg, finish with lift and dump.

combos.name: Body Lock → Lift Dump
combos.objective: Secure body lock, finish with lift and dump.

combos.name: Snatch Single → Run Pipe
combos.objective: Attack snatch single, finish with run the pipe.

combos.name: Snatch Single to Dump
combos.objective: Attack snatch single, finish with dump.
